definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: girdle —´[[א]] abs. Ex 28:4 +; [[אַבְנֵֽטְ֨ךָ]] Is 22:21; cstr. Ex 39:29; [[אַבְנֵטִים]] Ex 28:40; —girdle, of high priest Ex 28:4, Ex 28:39, Ex 39:29, Le 8:7, Le 16:4; of priests Ex 28:40, Ex 29:9, Le 8:13 (all P); of high official Is 22:21.—Josephus:iii. 7. 2 a)banh/q; cf. further Lag:Ges. Abh. 39.
